column2: <START> Did China give Olympics 2022 athletes an AWESOME gift bag with Samsung gadgets and a personalised necklaceHere are the facts  httpswwwtecharpcominternetchinaolympics2022giftbagPlease LIKE  SHARE this video and SUBSCRIBE to our channel
